SEARCH
Package ch.tbz.gino_goncalo.D1.garagesimulator

Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
ch.tbz.gino_goncalo.D1.garagesimulator.Vehicle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Car, Motorcycle, Truck
public abstract class Vehicle extends Object
Abstract base class representing a vehicle in the garage. Vehicles have a license plate, brand, model, color, and condition.
